text: Now the hit HBO series has overtaken the George R. R. Martin novels that is based upon, fans have gone into overdrive trying to work out how the show will conclude. The Game of Thrones season seven finale saw Jon Snow ( played by Kit Harington ) and Daenerys Targaryen ( Emilai Clarke ) enjoy a steamy romp after they believed Cersei Lannister ( Lena Headey ) had promised to help them defeat the Night King ( Vladimir Furdik ). However, Cersei has chosen to betray the pair in the hope that they will be killed and she can continue to rule Westeros in peace.
